description: Crude oil futures up due to US body data; API reports 15.4 mn barrel decline. US EIA to release report. Saudi Arabia & Russia announce output cuts. US withdraws offer to buy 6 mn barrels. MCX zinc & NCDEX jeera & dhaniya down/up.

title: Neutral MCX; target of Rs 1480: Motilal Oswal
description: Motilal Oswal recommended Neutral rating on MCX with a target price of Rs 1480 in its research report dated July 31, 2023.

title: Crude oil up as US inventory down by 17 million barrels
description: Crude oil prices rose on Thurs. US EIA data showed a 17 million barrel decline in crude oil inventories, the biggest since 1982. OPEC+ meeting on Fri. may extend Saudi Arabia’s voluntary production cut. Fitch downgraded US ratings, but demand in key consuming markets supported prices. MCX & NCDEX sa…

title: Aluminium futures: Price might go up
description: 75, respectively.Aluminium futures on MCX attempting to overturn bear trend, forming higher lows/highs. RSI/MACD in bullish zone. Resistance at ₹205, if breached, upswing to ₹212. If falls below ₹196, could slip to ₹192/186. Wait for breakout of ₹205, target/stop-loss at ₹212/202.75.

title: Crude oil gains as Saudi, Russia extend production cuts
description: Saudi/Russia extend oil production cuts, causing crude oil futures to rise. MCX/NCDEX trading shows August crude oil down 0.01%, turmeric up 3.51%, dhaniya up 1.92%. OPEC+ meeting later today.

title: Crude oil marginally down despite supply tightness
description: Crude oil futures trade lower despite Saudi Arabia & Russia’s decision to reduce production output in Sept. China to introduce stimulus measures to boost consumption. Inflation data from China & US awaited. MCX: Aug crude oil down 0.20%, nat gas up 0.99%; NCDEX: Aug guargum up 4.09%, turmeric down 1…

title: Copper futures: Buy August futures now
description: 75 and ₹785.Copper futures on MCX broke out of resistance at ₹745, but no follow-through rally. Currently trading at ₹738, with support at ₹734. If rally resumes, could retest ₹757 & break out to ₹785. If falls below ₹734, could drop to ₹712. Buy now, stop-loss at ₹730, liquidate at ₹756.75 & ₹785.

title: Gold, silver regain sheen
description: Precious metals regained their sheen in July, with Comex gold & silver posting their biggest monthly gain since March. Comex gold edged past the psychological $2,000-mark & MCX gold closed 2.75% higher. Comex silver registered 8.3% gain & MCX silver 7.7%. Prices are range-bound; a breach of upper/lo…

title: Gold falls Rs 80 to Rs 60,120/10 gm; silver plunges Rs 800
description: The Federal Reserve’s potential to continue tightening monetary policy helps the dollar gain some momentum, which is seen as a major factor weighing on the price of gold.In futures trade, the October contract of gold declined by Rs 50 to Rs 59,370 per 10 grams in afternoon deals on MCX. Silver futur…

title: “Crude Oil Futures Trade Lower in Mangaluru on China’s CPI Slump and US Inventory Increase”
description: Crude oil futures traded lower as China’s CPI slipped into negative territory & US crude oil inventory increased. August crude oil futures on MCX were up 0.18%, while zinc, guar gum & jeera futures on NCDEX were up 0.52%, 1.29% & 0.50% respectively.

title: Rising Natural Gas Prices: Breaking Resistance at ₹227 per mmBtu on MCX Futures Contract
description: Natural Gas Futures on MCX have risen, breaking resistance at ₹227. Immediate resistance is at ₹233, which is a medium-term trendline. If breached, prices can reach ₹250. If not, prices may fall to ₹220-₹217. Longer-term, prices have been range-bound between ₹200-₹235 since mid-June. Traders should …

title: MCX launches online dispute redressal platform
description: MCX, India’s largest commodity exchange, has partnered with Lex Carta Pvt as its primary Online Dispute Resolution (ODR) service provider. The ODR platform, known as “SMART ODR,” aims to streamline dispute resolution in the securities market by offering efficient mechanisms for resolving complaints …

title: Go short on zinc futures at the current level of ₹210
description: Zinc futures on MCX have dropped below ₹213, opening the door for further fall to ₹200. If it drops below ₹200, it could decline to ₹180. Short zinc at ₹210, add more at ₹213, stop-loss at ₹218, and book profits at ₹200.

title: Natural gas futures: Go long when the price softens to ₹210
description: Natural gas futures on MCX broke out to seven-month high of ₹250.3, but fell back. Bears likely to drag it to ₹210. Wait for price to moderate to ₹210, then buy with stop-loss at ₹200. Tighten stop-loss to ₹216 when it reaches ₹225, and trail to ₹220 at ₹230. Profit at ₹240.

title: Crude oil dips as Chinese property crisis roils market
description: Crude oil futures trading lower as China’s economic slowdown deepens. Property sector crisis in China further adds to market concerns. US Fed’s interest rate hike to contain inflation could impact demand for commodities. August menthaoil futures down 0.32% on MCX.

title: Gold, Silver Prices On August 18: Check Latest Bullion Rates In Your City - News18
description: Gold, Silver Prices in India on August 18: In the futures market, gold was marginally up at Rs 58,379 and silver was also slightly up at Rs 70,380 on the MCX

title: Copper futures: Likely to fall, go short
description: Copper futures on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) fell below a trendline support a fortnight ago. It also closed below the 20-day moving average (DMA) and since then, the outlook has been bearish.

title: At ₹1.81-lakh crore, MCX turnover hits new high
description: MCX hits new high of ₹1.81-lakh cr on back of prop trades, FPI participation in crude oil options. 57% of turnover from prop trades, FPI at ₹2,391 cr, other categories at ₹73,167 cr, domestic institutions & hedgers at ₹196 cr & ₹2,404 cr. Crude oil options trade at record high of ₹1.49-lakh cr, prop…

title: Aluminium futures: Might rally to touch ₹204
description: Aluminium futures on MCX have been oscillating b/w ₹196-204. If it bounces off range bottom, it can retest range top of ₹204. A rally past ₹204 can turn trend bullish, rising to ₹215. If it slips below ₹196, trend can turn bearish, dropping to ₹186-180. Risk-reward favours long positions; buy at ₹19…

title: Crude oil up as industry data shows decline in US inventories
description: Crude oil futures rise on US inventory decline; Chinese demand, US rate hike prospects limit gains. US API data shows 2.4M barrel decline in crude oil inventories, market expecting 2.9M. US Fed rate hike prospects, weak Chinese demand limit further gains. MCX mentha oil, jeera, turmeric futures also…

title: Zinc futures: Retain short position
description: Zinc futures on MCX have been declining since Aug. Unable to break resistance at ₹228, it broke below ₹213 support. Expect it to fall to ₹200. If it breaches ₹218, it could rise to ₹222. Go short at ₹210, stop-loss at ₹218. Tighten stop-loss to ₹210 if it drops below ₹205. Book profits at ₹200.

title: Gold, Silver Prices Today, August 25: Check Latest Bullion Rates In Your City - News18
description: Gold, Silver Prices On August 25: In the futures market, gold was trading down by 0.11 per cent to Rs 58,747 per 10 grams and silver was lower by 0.30 per cent to Rs 73,350 per kg on the MCX
